thread.title: Salman Khan to visit Ahmedabad for 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' promotions
thread.title_full: Salman Khan to visit Ahmedabad for 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' promotions - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Salman Khan to visit Ahmedabad for 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' promotions
text:
Superstar Salman Khan , who is returning to filmmaker Sooraj Barjatya's production banner Rajshri Productions with the forthcoming film “Prem Ratan Dhan Payo”, will kickstart the promotions of the family drama from here.*Salman Khan*
The actor will travel to the city in Gujarat on Wednesday to attend Garba programmes and ... »
